name: Spider's Grace
description: The Ananasi can move with incredible agility and grace, defying gravity. A spider-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Venom's Touch
description: The Ananasi can secrete a deadly venom through their skin. A spider-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Web Sense
description: The Ananasi can sense vibrations in their webs, alerting them to intruders. A spider-spirit teaches this Gift.
